It has been reported that more than half of alt ailments and deaths among young children are caused by germs. Children Ingest from food and water. Mothers should note that illnesses can be prevented by washing hands with soapan water after contact with facces and before handling food or water that we drink, says an expert. "Illnesses can be prevented by drinking germ-free clean water, mothers should see that the water they give kids is boiled, covered to prevent dirt and dust which can contaminate It. LIFE LIFE
Couples And Extra- Marital Sex Couples And Extra- Marital Sex

Most researchers agree that close to half of married men have at least one extra-marital fling. And indications are that women are almost as likely as men to cheat on their spouses. Latest research shows that affairs become prevalent as more men and women approach age 40; men tend to have their first affair within five years of marriage, while women usually wait longer. As men get older, they have affairs less often, while women begin having affairs later in life and tend to have It more frequently as they get older. As to why these men and women seek extra marital sex, the most frequently given reasons are opportunity, revenge, boredom, need for atten- tion, and the need for "someone who understands", Men also mentioned novelty and sexual attraction as motivating factors, while women were after sensitivity, tenderness and caring. The actual sex was the least frequently cited reason. Cosmopolitan Most researchers agree that close to half of married men have at least one extra-marital fling.
